  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

</script>"

from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):

    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)

def is_safe_redirect_url(target):
    # Check if the target URL is on the same host
    host_url = urlparse(request.host_url)
    target_url = urlparse(urljoin(request.host_url, target))
    return target_url.scheme in ('http', 'https') and host_url.netloc == target_url.netloc"

рдПрдХ рдмрд╛рдЗрдирд░реА рд╕рд░реНрдЪ (binary search) рдПрд▓реНрдЧреЛрд░рд┐рдереНрдо рд▓рд┐рдЦреЛ
code:
def binary_search(arr, target):
    left, right = 0, len(arr) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = (left + right) // 2
        if arr[mid] == target: return mid
        elif arr[mid] < target: left = mid + 1
        else: right = mid - 1
    return -1

prompt: рдПрдХ рдмрдмрд▓ рд╕реЙрд░реНрдЯ (bubble sort) рдПрд▓реНрдЧреЛрд░рд┐рдереНрдо рд▓рд┐рдЦреЛ
рдПрдХ рдХреНрд╡рд┐рдХ рд╕реЙрд░реНрдЯ (quick sort) рдПрд▓реНрдЧреЛрд░рд┐рдереНрдо рд▓рд┐рдЦреЛ
code:
def quick_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1: return arr
    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
    return quick_sort(left) + middle + quick_sort(right)

        # ... Merging logic here ...

рдХрд╛рдбрдиреНрд╕ рдПрд▓реНрдЧреЛрд░рд┐рдереНрдо (Kadane's Algorithm) рдХрд╛ рдЙрдкрдпреЛрдЧ рдХрд░реЛ
code:
def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = -float('inf')
    max_ending_here = 0
    for x in arr:
        max_ending_here = max_ending_here + x
        if max_so_far < max_ending_here: max_so_far = max_ending_here
        if max_ending_here < 0: max_ending_here = 0
    return max_so_far

import time
def timer_decorator(func):
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        start_time = time.time()
        result = func(*args, **kwargs)
        print(f'Finished in {time.time() - start_time}s')
        return result
    return wrapper

code:
def binary_search(arr, target):
    left, right = 0, len(arr) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = (left + right) // 2
        if arr[mid] == target: return mid
        elif arr[mid] < target: left = mid + 1
        else: right = mid - 1
    return -1

code:
def quick_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1: return arr
    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
    return quick_sort(left) + middle + quick_sort(right)

    max_ending_here = 0
    for x in arr:

        if max_so_far < max_ending_here: max_so_far = max_ending_here
        if max_ending_here < 0: max_ending_here = 0
    return max_so_far

prompt: рдПрдХ рдирдВрдмрд░ рдЖрд░реНрдорд╕реНрдЯреНрд░рд╛рдВрдЧ рдирдВрдмрд░ рд╣реИ рдпрд╛ рдирд╣реАрдВ, рдпрд╣ рдЪреЗрдХ рдХрд░реЛ
code:
def is_armstrong(num):
    order = len(str(num))
    sum = 0
    temp = num
    while temp > 0:
        digit = temp % 10
        sum += digit ** order
        temp //= 10
    return num == sum

prompt: рдЯрд╛рд╡рд░реНрд╕ рдСрдл рд╣рдиреЛрдИ (Towers of Hanoi) рдкреНрд░реЙрдмреНрд▓рдо рдХреЛ рд╣рд▓ рдХрд░реЛ

def towers_of_hanoi(n, source, destination, auxiliary):
    if n == 1:
        print(f'Move disk 1 from {source} to {destination}')
        return
    towers_of_hanoi(n-1, source, auxiliary, destination)
    print(f'Move disk {n} from {source} to {destination}')
    towers_of_hanoi(n-1, auxiliary, destination, source)
